participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and determined, Emma is passionate about her goals and dreams. She is hardworking and dedicated to her studies.
participant_1.background: i was raised on a horse farm. my family has raised horses for generations. i want to be a lawyer. i'm from a small town.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Friendly and approachable, Michael enjoys engaging with others and sharing his interests. He has a playful side and loves to have fun.
participant_2.background: my parents were also teachers. i'm an elementary school teacher. i love to play board games. my favorite band is up and i got to see them in concert once. for vacation i enjoy time at the beach.
